User Input: Give me all albums by the artist named 'Queen'.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT AlbumId, Title FROM Album WHERE ArtistId = (SELECT ArtistId FROM Artist WHERE Name = 'Queen');

User Input: List all customers who live in Canada.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Country = 'Canada';

User Input: Find the total sales for customer with email 'john.doe@example.com'.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT SUM(Total) FROM Invoice WHERE CustomerId = (SELECT CustomerId FROM Customer WHERE Email = 'john.doe@example.com');

User Input: Which employee has the highest EmployeeId?
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY EmployeeId DESC LIMIT 1;

User Input: Show me all tracks that are longer than 5 minutes.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Track WHERE Milliseconds > 300000;

User Input: Get invoice details where the total is exactly 50.00.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE Total = 50.00;

User Input: Find all customers whose last name starts with 'S'.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE LastName LIKE 'S%';

User Input: How many tracks are in the playlist named 'Rock Classics'?
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PlaylistTrack WHERE PlaylistId = (SELECT PlaylistId FROM Playlist WHERE Name = 'Rock Classics');

User Input: Retrieve the invoice date and total amount for the most recent invoice.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT InvoiceDate, Total FROM Invoice ORDER BY InvoiceDate DESC LIMIT 1;

User Input: Find all tracks that have no composer listed.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Track WHERE Composer IS NULL OR Composer = '';

User Input: List all customers who have ordered more than 5 times.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT CustomerId, COUNT(*) as OrderCount FROM Invoice GROUP BY CustomerId HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

User Input: Find the most expensive track.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT TrackId, MAX(UnitPrice) FROM InvoiceLine;

User Input: Show me the total revenue generated by each artist.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) AS TotalRevenue FROM Artist a JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC;

User Input: List all employees who report to the CEO.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE ReportsTo IS NULL;

User Input: Find all customers who have never made a purchase.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE CustomerId NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT CustomerId FROM Invoice);

User Input: What is the total number of tracks sold?
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT SUM(Quantity) FROM InvoiceLine;

User Input: Get the most common genre in the database.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT GenreId, COUNT(*) as GenreCount FROM Track GROUP BY GenreId ORDER BY GenreCount DESC LIMIT 1;

User Input: Which playlist has the most tracks?
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT PlaylistId, COUNT(*) as TrackCount FROM PlaylistTrack GROUP BY PlaylistId ORDER BY TrackCount DESC LIMIT 1;

User Input: List all customers and their total spending.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(i.Total) AS TotalSpending FROM Customer c JOIN Invoice i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName ORDER BY TotalSpending DESC;

User Input: Show the average invoice total.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT AVG(Total) FROM Invoice;

User Input: Find all invoices issued in the last 30 days.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Invoice WHERE InvoiceDate >= DATE('now', '-30 days');

User Input: Which artist has the most albums?
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT ArtistId, COUNT(*) as AlbumCount FROM Album GROUP BY ArtistId ORDER BY AlbumCount DESC LIMIT 1;

User Input: Retrieve the longest track name in the database.
Ground Truth SQL: SELECT * FROM Track ORDER BY LENGTH(Name) DESC LIMIT 1;
